script-token.name: token
commands: account create -n random --args privateKey:privKeyAcc1 --args name:nameAcc1 --args accountId:idAcc1
account create -n random --args privateKey:privKeyAcc2 --args name:nameAcc2 --args accountId:idAcc2
account create -n random --args privateKey:privKeyAcc3 --args name:nameAcc3 --args accountId:idAcc3
token create -n mytoken -s MTK -d 2 -i 1000 --supply-type infinite -a {{privKeyAcc1}} -t {{idAcc2}} -k {{privKeyAcc2}} --args tokenId,tokenId

script-account-create.name: account-create
commands: account create -n random -b 10000000 --args privateKey:privKeyAcc1 --args name:nameAcc1 --args accountId:idAcc1

script-account-create-simple.name: account-create-simple
commands: account create -n random -b 10000000 --args privateKey:privKeyAcc1 --args name:nameAcc1 --args accountId:idAcc1
